div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
70859-4Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Neutralization test
6527-6Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Units/volume] in Specimen by Neutralization test
6523-5Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Neutralization test
6525-0Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Units/volume] in Tissue by Neutralization test
6524-3Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Units/volume] in Serum by Neutralization test
43980-2Rabies virus neutralizing antibody [Titer] in Serum by Neutralization test

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
122078009Measurement of Rabies virus antibody (procedure)
